ARABIC: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَلَا هُدًى وَلَا كِتَٰبٍ مُّنِيرٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Among people there is one who argues about Allah without knowledge or guidance or any light-giving Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet there are some who contend about God without any knowledge or guidance or enlightening Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And among people are those that wrangle about Allah without knowledge, without any true guidance, and without any scripture to enlighten them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Some people argue about God without knowledge, guidance, and an enlightening Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And there is one who argues concerning Allah without having knowledge nor any proof nor a clear text.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And among men is he who disputes about Allah, without knowledge or guidance, or a Book giving light (from Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And among men there is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and without guidance and without an illuminating book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And among men there is such a one that disputes concerning God without knowledge or guidance, or an illuminating Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And among mankind is he who disputeth concerning Allah without knowledge or guidance or a scripture giving light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There are some who dispute about God without having any knowledge or guidance, or any enlightening Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And of mankind is he who disputeth respecting Allah without knowledge or guidance or a Book luminous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Among the people are those who dispute concerning Allah without any knowledge or guidance, or an enlightening Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet there is among men such a one as disputes about Allah, without Knowledge, without Guidance, and without a Book of Enlightenment,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And among men is he who disputes about Allah, without knowledge or guidance, or a Book giving light (from Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Some dispute about Allah, though they have neither knowledge nor guidance, nor an illuminating Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And among the people is he who argues about God without knowledge, or guidance, or an enlightening scripture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:8] The following was revealed regarding Abū Jahl: And among mankind there are some who dispute about God without [any] knowledge or guidance, [being] with him, or an enlightening Scripture, one containing light, [being] with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And among mankind is he who disputeth concerning Allah) argues against Allah's religion and Scripture (without knowledge or guidance) or proof (or a Scripture giving light) or Scripture expositing what he says.
